#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int ans(char a[], char b[])
{
	int cnt=0;
	int l1= strlen(a), l2= strlen(b);
	
	for(int i=0; i<l1; i++)
		a[i] -= '0';
	for(int i=0; i<l2; i++)
		b[i] -= '0';
	
	int carry=0;
	if(l1 == l2)
	{
		for(int i=l1-1; i>=0; i--)
		{
			carry = (carry + a[i] + b[i]) / 10;
			if(carry)	
				++cnt;
		}
	}
	else if(l1<l2)
	{
		int i,j;
		for(i=l1-1, j=l2-1; i>=0; i--, j--)
		{
			carry = (carry + a[i] + b[j]) / 10;
			if(carry)	
				++cnt;
		}
		for(int i=j; i>=0; i--)
		{
			carry = (carry + b[j]) / 10;
			if(carry)	
				++cnt;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		int i,j;
		for(i=l2-1, j=l1-1; i>=0; i--, j--)
		{
			carry = (carry + a[j] + b[i]) / 10;
			if(carry)	
				++cnt;
		}
		for(int i=j; i>=0; i--)
		{
			carry = (carry + a[i]) / 10;
			if(carry)	
				++cnt;
		}
	}
	return cnt;
}

int main()
{
	char a[12], b[12];
	while(1)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(!strcmp(a, "0") && !strcmp(b, "0") )
			break;
		if(int p = ans(a, b))
		{
			if(p>1)
				cout<<p<<" carry operations."<<endl;
			else
				cout<<p<<" carry operation."<<endl;
		}
		else
			cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
